sentences: Kasvit ovat eläinten ja ihmisten tärkein ravintolähde.
context: The Finnish word 'kasvi' means plant in English. It refers to any living organism that typically grows in the ground, has leaves and stems, and produces its own food through photosynthesis. The word can refer to individual plants, vegetation in general, or flora collectively. In different contexts, it might be used for houseplants, garden plants, wild plants, or even vegetables as food items.
